sections.badge: Ahead of the curve: Built on new MCP standards
sections.subtitle: Empower every team to build production AI apps with enterprise security, observability, and control. Deploy anywhere. Own everything.

sections.title: Your teams are building AI.
sections.description: Business teams are prototyping in Lovable, n8n, and ChatGPT—but prototypes don't ship. Engineering becomes a bottleneck. Shadow IT spreads. Compliance gets nervous. You're stuck choosing between innovation velocity and control.

painPoints.title: Shadow IT Chaos
painPoints.description: Ungoverned tools leading to data leaks.

painPoints.title: Prototypes Never Ship
painPoints.description: No auth, no audit trails, no prod infra.

painPoints.title: Cost Surprises
painPoints.description: Runaway token usage and fragmented billing.

sections.title: From Chaos to Control
sections.subtitle: What your organization gains by adopting MCP Mesh.

benefits.title: Predictability & FinOps
benefits.description: Turn the "black box" of AI costs into a clear dashboard. Allocate budgets per team and avoid bill shocks from OpenAI/Anthropic.

benefits.title: Accelerated Procurement
benefits.description: Once the Mesh is homologated, any tool inside is pre-approved. Developers gain speed without asking for permission for every new API.

benefits.title: Output Quality
benefits.description: Managing context with precision increases generation quality. Deliver the right data, with the right limits, to the right agents.

benefits.title: Visibility & Alignment
benefits.description: Centralize all AI contracts. Get macro visibility into how your organization is using autonomous agents.

sections.title: Why DecoCMS vs. Alternatives
sections.subtitle: Don't settle for prototypes or internal-only tools.

sections.title:
One platform.
Business builds. Tech governs.
sections.subtitle: DecoCMS unifies the entire AI application lifecycle. From vibecoding to enterprise governance in a single pane of glass.

cards.title: Empower AI Builders
cards.description: Business users create full-stack AI apps with vibecoding. No code required—just describe the tool, workflow, or dashboard you need. Get to production in days.

cards.title: Govern the MCP Mesh
cards.description: Context Engineers manage centralized MCP infrastructure. Control access to data, tools, and models across all apps from a single control plane.

cards.title: Observe Everything
cards.description: Every AI interaction traced. Follow the path: User Action → Agent Call → Model Response → Cost. Real-time auditing for compliance.

sections.title: FAQs

faqItems.question: What is deco CMS, and how is it different from other AI app builders?
faqItems.answer: deco CMS is an open-source Context CMS — a control plane and runtime for building, running, and monetizing AI apps. Unlike traditional app builders, it unifies context, governance, observability, and monetization in one platform.

faqItems.question: How does deco CMS handle governance and observability?
faqItems.answer: Every run is fully traced, auditable, and secure. DecoCMS includes role-based access control (RBAC), spend caps, error analytics, and per-step cost visibility — ensuring safe operations and compliance by default.

faqItems.question: How does the deco CMS SDK work for developers?
faqItems.answer: The deco CMS SDK lets you build, extend, and manage agents, workflows, and UIs in TypeScript. It integrates seamlessly with the CLI, enabling local development, testing, and edge deployment from a single codebase.

faqItems.question: What is the Context Mesh, and why is it important?
faqItems.answer: The Context Mesh is DecoCMS's governed layer for connecting data, tools, and models. It provides typed connectors with built-in policy routing, RBAC, observability, and spend controls — ensuring the right context is delivered safely every time.

faqItems.question: Does deco CMS support edge deployment?
faqItems.answer: Yes. deco CMS ships agents, workflows, and UIs to the edge automatically, ensuring low latency and global performance by default. You can manage environments, preview builds, and deploy updates directly from the CLI.

faqItems.question: How does deco CMS integrate with Git?
faqItems.answer: deco CMS uses a Git-backed workflow by default. Every change to agents, workflows, and UIs is versioned, allowing you to branch, review, and merge updates just like any modern development stack. This ensures full traceability and safe collaboration between teams.
